Release/NN of/IN the/DT Draft/NNP Scope/NNP of/IN Work/NNP for/IN Water/NNP for/IN the/DT Future/NNP Upstate/NNP Water/NNP Supply/NNP Resiliency/NNP Project/NNP and/CC Schedule/NNP of/IN Public/NNP Meetings/NNP To/NNP repair/NN significant/JJ leaks/NNS in/IN the/DT Rondout-West/JJ Branch/NN Tunnel/NNP (/NNP RWBT/NNP )/NNP of/IN the/DT Delaware/NNP Aqueduct/NNP ,/, the/DT New/NNP York/NNP City/NNP Department/NNP of/IN Environmental/NNP Protection/NNP (/NNP DEP/NNP )/NNP developed/VBD the/DT Water/NNP for/IN the/DT Future/NNP Program/NNP (/NNP WFF/NNP )/NNP ./. As/NNP part/NN of/IN the/DT program/NN ,/, DEP/NNP elected/VBD to/TO construct/VB a/DT bypass/NN tunnel/NN and/CC two/CD associated/VBN shafts/NNS to/TO permanently/RB circumvent/JJ the/DT leaking/NN section/NN of/IN the/DT tunnel/NN at/IN the/DT Roseton/NNP crossing/NN in/IN the/DT Town/NNP of/IN Newburgh/NNP ,/, NY/NNP ,/, and/CC to/TO conduct/VB internal/JJ repairs/NNS to/TO the/DT leaking/NN section/NN in/IN Wawarsing/NNP ,/, NY/NNP ./. This/DT project/NN was/VBD previously/RB evaluated/VBN in/IN a/DT FEIS/NNP issued/VBD on/IN May/NNP 18/CD ,/, 2012/CD ,/, and/CC work/NN has/VBZ commenced/VBN ./. Once/NNP the/DT tunnel/NN and/CC shafts/NNS are/VBP completed/VBN in/IN 2022/CD ,/, the/DT RWBT/NNP would/MD be/VB temporarily/RB shut/VBN down/IN and/CC drained/VBN to/TO connect/VB the/DT bypass/NN tunnel/NN to/TO the/DT existing/VBG RWBT/NNP and/CC to/TO carry/VB out/RP internal/JJ repairs/NNS ./. DEP/NNP estimates/VBZ that/IN the/DT maximum/NN shutdown/NN duration/NN would/MD be/VB approximately/RB eight/CD months/NNS ./. During/IN this/DT temporary/JJ shutdown/NN of/IN the/DT RWBT/NNP ,/, water/NN from/IN the/DT Delaware/NNP system/NN west/NN of/IN the/DT Hudson/NNP River/NNP would/MD be/VB unavailable/JJ ./.
